review: I'm in love with this device. It definitely has the feel of an Amazon-driven device, but considering that Prime Instant Video offers so much excellent TV and a variety of movies these days, I find no issue with it. I found it only takes a little time and experience to get used to navigating the menus, after which it's smooth sailing. Compared to the 2011 Roku LT I was using (which could no longer handle Youtube or Amazon Prime at all), the Fire TV stick feels super fast. If I thought about it more, I'm sure there are some things about it that could be improved- but overall, it's an amazing product. Especially for the price!
author: Amazon Customer
